name: Lethal Application リーサルアプリケーション
name_original: Lethal Application リーサルアプリケーション
description:
■Objective of the game
Fly through the air in the extremely inefficient way of gun recoil.
Use of sub-weapons and the final use of the Burst Mode is the key to stage clear!

■Tricks
Consume energy just by shooting shots.
It's easier to clear and have fun playing if you climb with momentum rather than fine braking.
　
When you can't attack the enemy well with recoil Use your secondary weapons wisely.

The burst mode activated by pressing two attack buttons at the same time is All health, 3x attack and significantly increase charge speed Instead, full life recovery.
If you're going to die, use it and bet on the reversal!

■By the way...
Even if it bursts immediately after the start It is designed to clear all stage.
